content.name: Leo Praminda Vindika
content.intro:
A leader who dares to meet and conquer obstacles, rather than to avoid them. Inducted as a Leo member in the year 2016 to Leo Club of University of Moratuwa this dynamic yet humble personality has touched many hearts throughout the years. His efforts to push youngsters to become the best leaders and ability to push through obstacles have proved his worth into becoming yet another strong leader for Leo District 306 A2. Best characterized as an optimistic and cheerful personality, Leo Praminda Vindika is simply an all rounder.

Highlights of Leo Life

From participating and organizing over 200 projects Leo Vindika has been an energetic leader working towards the betterment of the youth leaders of this movement. His commitment and motivation with the capability to manage and balance work capabilities have been appreciated by a countless number of Leo and Lion Leaders from the very beginning of his Leo career. The following are the positions and achievements of Leo Praminda Vindika in his Leoistic career.

In fiscal year 2019/2020 

  • Winner – Most Outstanding Line Officer
  • Winner – Most Popular Council Officer
  • Top 10 - Most Outstanding Leos of the Year

In fiscal year 2019/2020

  • Zonal Director of Zone C1 - District Council of Leo District 306 A2
  • Chairman - Marians Thaala mega fundraiser
  • Orientation committee member

In fiscal year 2018/2019

  • Club Treasurer of Leo Club of University of Moratuwa
  • Winner - Most Outstanding Leo Club Treasurer in Sri Lanka
  • Winner - Most popular Leo in Leo District 306 A2
  • Chairman - Leo District Conference - Parade Ceremony 2019
  • Assistant Treasurer - Leo Multiple District Conference 2019

In fiscal year 2017/2018

  • Chief Activity Coordinator of Leo Club of University of Moratuwa
  • Winner - Most Outstanding Leo Scholar in Leo district 306 A2
  • Chairman - Singing Committee - El Talento
  • Most Supportive Leo - 2nd runner up - Leo District 306 A2
  • Project Secretary - Jeevana Yathra 2017

In fiscal year 2016/2017

  • Most Outstanding new Leo of the year - 2nd runners up

Life outside Leo

Born to Mr. Ananda Kularathna and Mrs. Rani De Alwis and they have been the strength behind this guiding figure and he is blessed with an elder sister Shalini Kularathna. Currently works at ZOOMi SoftLab Pvt Ltd as a Software Engineer and he has completed Comprehensive Master Java Developer at IJSE. He is a proud product of Mahinda College, Galle and also holds a BSc (Hons) in Electrical Engineering from the University of Moratuwa. He is the Vice President of the Classical Music Society in the year of 2017/18 he has organized and performed Yathra in 3 consecutive times. And also, a member of Electrical Engineering Society & Buddhist Society of University of Moratuwa. His inborn ability led him to be the winner of all Island Inter School Music Competitions in the years 2010, 2009 & 2008 and all Island Inter School Drama Competitions in years 2010 & 2009.

content.name: Leo Mudith Jayasekara
content.intro:
As a charismatic person with a humble persona, Leo Mudith Jayasekara was the guiding figure of Leo District 306 A2 for the Leoistic year 2019/2020. Being the symbol of resilience, he is, as can be seen throughout his Leo career, he proved another beacon of light to escort A2 to greater heights.

Leoistic Career

Being introduced into the Leo movement in 2012 as a club member of Leo Club of Polgasowita, he first functioned in the club board in the year 2013-14. He was fortunate to become the Club President of the Leo Club of Polgasowita in the year 2015-2016 and under his guidance led them towards a successful leoistic year. He then was a part of the District council as a member of the Editorial Panel in the year 2014-2015 and had held various other positions as follows. In the year 2016-2017 Leo Mudith was the District Treasurer of Leo District 306A2 and a Centennial Coordinator for the Leo Multiple District 306. Later in 2017-2018 he was the Chief Administration Coordinator of Leo District 306 A2. Furthermore, in the year 2018-2019 he acted as the Regional Director for Region A of Leo District 306 A2 and also as the Multiple District Assistant Secretary of Leo Multiple District 306. His journey in Leoism flourished and he was further able to be part of the organizing committees of several events within the Leo District and Leo Multiple District arena as follows,

  • 2015 - Secretary for the District Talent Show of Leo District 306 A2, EL Talento ‘15.
  • 2016 – Committee member in the ISAAME Secretariat and Co-Chairman of ISAAME Administration committee. (1st ever Leo ISAAME Forum)
  • 2018-2019 – Functioned as the chairman of the registration committee of the 1st ever leadership symposium ‘Trailblazer 2018’ for corporate executives organized by Leo Multiple District 306.
  • 2018-2019 - Chairman of the Leo President’s Camp 2018 2018-2019 - Chairman of the Business Session of the 14 th Annual Leo District 306 A2 Conference.
  • 2018-2019 - Chairman of the Conference Steering committee of Leo Multiple District 306.

Recognition

Nonetheless, his diligence towards the growth of Leoism has also been recognized in various capacities and instances and a few can be seen as,

  • 2013-2014 - The most outstanding Leo Club Treasurer in Leo Multiple District 306.
  • 2014-2015 - Most outstanding club Vice-President at the Leo District 306 A2 conference.
  • 2015-2016 - Most outstanding club President 1st Runner-up at the Leo District 306 A2 Conference. Top ten Leos of Leo District 306 A2 recognition for three consecutive Leoistic years since 2016 - 2019.
  • 2018-2019 - Winner - Most Outstanding Multiple Council Officer.
  • 2018-2019 - Recipient of Leo of the Year award at Leo Multiple District Conference 306.

Academic and Extra-curricular

Leo Mudith is a proud product of Prince of Wales’ College, Moratuwa. He holds his bachelor’s degree in Computing from the University of London Metropolitan, UK. Furthermore, he hold an MBA from the University of Wales Trinity Saint David. In profession, he is presently engaged in the field of Digital Content Development & Innovation and is working as a Web and Platform manager at Dialog Axiata PLC.

content.name: Leo Navod Kiriwaththuduwa
content.intro:
Those who know the least obey the best and emerge wonderful. Leo Navod in all his efforts proved himself to become the rich personality whom that he is today. From the start he was a forerunner with the fortune to become a Charter Leo Club President in 2016/2017 fiscal year. Within the Leo Club, he has been a force of nature whilst holding the baton of organizing and coordinating many number of projects which include multiple service activities to the community and projects to further uplift the leadership essence of the existing Leo members, taking the initiative in budding new blood to this great movement. Leo Navod was a key component in the success of the Mega multi service project “Jeewana Yathra 2018” where he functioned as the Co-Chairman. He has been appreciated by various Leo and Lion leaders from the year 2016/2017 up to date for his unwavering support and dedication.

Highlights of Leo Life

The following sets of positions were carried out effectively by Leo Navod Kiriwaththuduwa in his Leoistic career.

District Level

  • Chairman – Orientation committee – 2019/2020
  • Director – Membership Retention – 2019/2020
  • Chairman – PR & Publicity Awards and Tokens – President Camp – 2019
  • Chairman – Fund raising committee – Marians Thaala – 2020
  • Coordinator – District Piritha – 2019/2020
  • Coordinator – Club officers work shop – 2019/2020
  • Chairman – Ushering Committee (Crowd Handling) – Marians Thaala – 2020
  • Co-chairman – Leo Youth Camp 2020
  • Co-chairman – Orientation committee – 2018/2019
  • Chairman – Conference Awards committee – 2018/2019
  • Region Director – Region B – 2018/2019
  • Chairman – A2 Media unit – 2018/2019
  • Chairman – Conference fundraising committee 2017/2018
  • Director – Youth centennial Director 2017/2018
  • Chairman – “Pancha Prayamaya” Orientation treasurer hunt – 2017/2018
  • Member – Orientation committee – 2017/2018
  • Volunteer – Lions ISAAME forum – 2016
  • Member – Talent show organizing committee – 2016/2017
  • Member – District Awurudu Ulela organizing committee – 2016/2017
  • Member – A2 sport day organizing committee – 2016/2017
  • Co-chairman – Conference parade committee – 2016/2017

Multiple District Level

  • Member – Multiple District Council – 2019/2020
  • Member – Sargent at arms Multiple District Conference – 2018/2019
  • Member – Registration committee – Trailblazer Leadership Forum 2018
  • Leo District A2 Chairman – Leo Walk-A-Thon 2019
  • Chairman – Decoration committee – Multiple Olympics 2018
  • Member – Multiple District Conference committee – 2018
  • Member – Multiple District Conference committee – 2017

Achievements of Leo Life

The following are the awards achieved by Leo Navod Kiriwaththuduwa in his journey within the Leo District 306 A2 and in Multiple District 306, Sri Lanka. 

District Level

  • Winner – Most Outstanding New Club President – Leo District Conference 2017
  • Winner – Best New Leo – Leo District Conference 2017
  • Winner – Best New Camper – Leo Youth Camp 2017
  • Winner – Most popular Leo – Leo District Conference 2017
  • Winner - Best Project for Sports & Recreation - LEO CODCON
  • LEO of the Year – 2019/2020 

Multiple Level

  • Winner - Most Outstanding New Leo Club – 2016/2017
  • 1st Runner up – Best New Leo – 2016/2017
  • Winner - Best Project for Public Relations, Communication and Marketing - Samaye Seenu Handa
  • 2nd Runner Up - Best Project for Sports & Recreation - LEO CODCON
  • 2nd Runner Up - Most Outstanding Immediate Past Club President – 2017/2018
  • Winner - Best Project for Betterment of Leoism – Panchaprayamaya
  • Winner - Most Outstanding Service Project – Jeewana Yathra
  • Winner - Best Project for Literacy & Education - Jeewana Yathra

International Level

  • 100% Club President – 2016/2017
  • Leo Award Medal of Honor Recipient – 2017/18
  • Receiving “Spotlight on Children Banner patch” from Lions Clubs International
  • Receiving 2 Membership growth lapel pins
  • Participated to Lions ISAAME Forum 2016 – Colombo, Sri Lanka as a Volunteer.

Other awards and recognition

  • Best Camper – Leo Youth Camp 2018 – Naula Youth Corps
  • Best New Camper – Leo Youth Camp 2017 – Academy of Adventure, Belihul Oya
  • Leo of the Month of March - District President Leo Kalindu Dissanayaka – 2017/2018

Life outside Leo

  • Vice President - Student Interactive Society 2016/2017
  • Lead Operations - University Students' Enterprise 2018
  • Representative - National Youth Modal United Nations 2018
  • Logistics Team Member - International Symposium on Industrial Systems, INSYS - 2017
  • Treasurer - IEEE Student, Young Professionals, Women in engineering Conference 2019
  • Logistics Team Member - SLTC Battlebots 2017
  • Volunteer - Red Cross Sri Lanka - 2018
  • School Head Prefect – 2013/2014 , Kegalu Vidyalaya
  • Volunteer - Asala Maha Sisu Perahera 2013 - Education Ministry – 2013
  • Volunteer - Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting 2013

Leo Navod is a proud product of the Kegalu Vidyalaya, Kegalle which has supported him with reaching his goals in life with the support of his main pillars, his father Upul Kiriwaththuduwa and mother Chandani Pelangoda who are by profession COO at Global Systems Solutions International (PVT) Ltd and science teacher for OL students, Suwarna Jayanthi Vidyalaya kegalle respectively. His only sister Navoda Kiriwaththuduwa is an undergraduate student of faculty of medicine in Rajarata University of Sri Lanka.

content.name: Leo Raseema Sugandi
content.intro:
Leo Raseema a Charter Member of Leo Club of Sri Lanka Technological Campus began her leoistic career in 2016 and was the charter secretary in 2016/2017 Centennial Year. She was first invited District Council in year 2018/2019. She has held positions including Assistant District Secretary and Zone Director. At present she serves as the District Secretary of Leo District 306 A2.

In her journey in Leoism she was able to be part of organizing committees of several events within the Leo District as follows,

  • 2016 – Organizing committee member of Talentalize’17, The Annual District Talent Show of Leo District 306 A2.
  • 2017 - Entertainment Chairman of the 12th Annual Leo District 306 A2 Conference.
  • 2018 – Co Chairman of the Necrology Committee of 13th Annual Leo District 306 A2 Conference.
  • 2019 – Secretary of the Business Session of the 14th Annual Leo District 306 A2 Conference.
  • 2020 – Advisor of the Souvenir committee of 15th Annual Leo District 306 A2 Conference.
  • 2020 – Chairman of the 16th Annual Leo District Installation Ceremony of Leo District 306 A2.

Recognition

  • 2nd Runners up – The Most Outstanding Line Officer in the District Contest conducted by Leo District 306 A2 in 2020.
  • Adjudged as Top 10 of the Most Outstanding Leos of the Year in the District Contest conducted by Leo District 306 A2 in 2020.
  • 2nd Runners Up - Most Outstanding Council Officers – 2018/19
  • 1st Runners Up - Most Outstanding Leo unit member – 2016/17

Life outside of the Leo

She is a proud product of Sri Devananda College, Ambalangoda and currently reading BSc (Hons) Electronics and Engineering Management at Sri Lanka Technological Campus. She was the charter secretary of IEEE Student Branch of Sri Lanka Technological Campus and initiate the IEEE Women in Engineering Affinity Group of SLT Campus as the Chair in 2019.

Home town – Galle, Imaduwa Born in - 1994 Father – A businessman Mother – Housewife 2 sisters

Past Professions

Leoism

  • Inducted in 2016 October as a member of Leo Club of University of Moratuwa

In 2017/18

  • Club vice president of Leo Club of University of Moratuwa
  • Most Outstanding Leo club vice president in Sri Lanka
  • Most popular Leo in Leo District 306A2

In 2018/19

  • Club President of Leo Club of University of Moratuwa
  • 1st Runner up in Most outstanding club president in Leo District 306A2
  • Co-chairman of ceremonial session of Leo Multiple awards
  • Secretary of ceremonial session of A2 con’19

In 2019/20

  • Zonal Director of Zone A1
  • Orientation committee member
  • Chairman of District trip “Leo Sarisara 2019”
  • Most Outstanding Immediate past club president in Sri Lanka
  • Most outstanding council officer 1st Runners up in Leo District 306 A2
  • Most popular council officer 1st Runners up in Leo District 306 A2

In 2020/21

  • Assistant treasurer of Leo Multiple district 306 Sri Lanka

content.name: Leo Dinendri Wilegoda Arachchige
content.intro:
Leo Dinendri joined her mother club Leo Club of Polgasowita in the year 2017. Initially becoming the club newsletter co-editor where she won most outstanding bulletin editor 1st runners up in the 13th Annual Leo District Conference. Later in 2018-19 fiscal year she became the Club Secretary and was awarded 4th runner-up as the most outstanding Leo club secretary at A2CON 2019 She was also a member of the A2CON 2019 souvenir committee and also a member of the registration committee at the Leo Multiple Awards 2019.

In the Leoistic year 2019-2020 she became the club president of Leo Club of Polgasowita and led the legacy of the club under her theme “Together for Tomorrow” where she placed Most outstanding Club president at A2CON’20 and placed 2 nd Runner up at the Leo Multiple Awards 2020. Under her presidency the glory of her mother club shined even more as the Most Outstanding Leo Club - 2nd runner up at A2CON’20 and winning countless others aswell.

Amidst her presidency in the past year her journey in Leoism flourished and she was further able to be part of the organizing committees of several events within the Leo District arena as follows,

  • Member of District Editorial panel.
  • Secretary of the Mega multi service project Jeewana Yathra 2019 Ampara.
  • Secretary of Leo Youth Camp 2020.
  • Chairman of Awards and tokens committee at Marians Thaala Mega fundraiser.
  • Member of fundraising and the ushering committees at Marians Thaala Mega fundraiser.
  • Decorations committee co-chairperson of A2CON'20.

Her dedication and commitment towards the Leo movement gained her the achievement of “Leo of the Month” in the month of October 2019 presented by Leo District 306A2.

Leo Dinendri began her education at the Sri Lankan School Muscat in the Sultanate of Oman and later relocated to Sri Lanka in the year 2014 where she schooled at Gateway College Colombo. Her leadership skills were proven by her being a school junior leader, steward, junior prefect and House sports captain respectively. Her talents numerous co-curricular activities such as art & design, drama, dancing and sport gained numerical wins in a multitude of competitions.

Following her dreams she went on to complete the Diploma in Baking at Prima Baking Training Center and worked as a professional cake decorator at Yami cakes Pitta-Kotte thereafter. Currently Leo Dinendri works as an administrative assistant and coordinator of event planning and weddings at Weddings by Suranga Fernando and is currently reading for the Pearson certified Higher National Diploma in Business Management at Esoft Metro Campus towards obtaining the BA in Business Administration awarded by London Metropolitan University UK.

As a dynamic personality with various talents and capabilities Leo Dinendri is in search for opportunities to contribute to the Leo family not only as the Immediate past club President of the Leo Club of Polgasowita but also as the District assistant secretary for the upcoming Leoistic year.

content.name: Leo Vihan Manage
content.intro:
Leo Vihan, an energetic, passionate individual is a proud product of Royal College Colombo and currently an undergraduate at General Sir John Kotelawala Defense University following the degree of BSc In Mechanical Engineering.

With the aim of serving the needy he joined Leoism in year 2016 as a club member of Leo club of Godigamuwa. He then functioned as the secretary of the club for the year 2017/18 by bringing glory to the club by being awarded as the best secretary 2nd runners up at the district conference in the same year. Setting another milestone in his career in leoism he was appointed the president of Leo club of Godigamuwa for the year 2018/19 and with his leadership and teamwork skills he was able to bring the club to the 4th place in the district & also placed 3rd for most outstanding club presidents in the same year which is definitely a fact to be proud of.

He held many positions in district events for the year 2018/19 & among them the most important positions were being appointed as the Treasurer of Jeewana Yathra and Treasurer of Leo Youth camp.

Stepping on to the year 2019/2020 he served in the district as the Fellowship Director where he gave his fullest support to all fellowship projects organized by the clubs of the district 306A2. To appreciate his dedication to Leoism he was awarded the “Leo of the month of July” and most importantly he was trusted to lead the most famous mega Service project called Jeewana Yanthra where his leadership skills were displayed and recognized.

To recognize his contribution to Leoism he was awarded the award for the top ten Leos of Leo District 306A2, The most outstanding Club President second runners up for his constant support to his club at all times and also the most popular council officer second runners up for always rendering his time and effort for all the activities of the district at the A2 CON 20, the annual District conference, marking an important milestone in his career in Leoism.

Being an example of an charismatic personality with the ability to multi task and balance responsibilities without doubt Leo Vihan is currently serving as the District Assistant Treasurer of Leo District 306A2 aswell as the District Director for International Relations.

content.name: Lion Anura Goonetilleke
content.intro:
Education:

  • Highlands College, Nugegoda
  • Isipathana College, Colombo 5

Profession:

  • Managing Director, Fibretechno Traders, Nugegoda
  • Managing Director, Teliot Industries, Boralesgamuwa
  • Served as a Tour Guide Lecturer at Ceylon Tourist Board for 16 years
  • Served a Chief Coordinator at Mass Media & Information Ministry for 3 years

Lionistic Career:

  • A Charter Member of the Lions Club of Dampe Piliyandala in 2005 and served as board member
  • Club President of the Lions Club of Dampe Piliyandala for 6 months in 2008/2009
  • Joined Lions Club of Dampe as a transfer member and its Charter President in 2008/2009 and its Board Member since then
  • Continued as Club Presidency in 2009/2010
  • Founder of the Leo Club of Dampe in 2008/2009 and was its Advisor until its closure
  • Leo Advisor of the Leo Club of Godigamuwa from 2012/2013 to 2018/2019
  • District Chairman for Leos in consecutive 4 Leoistic years since 2017/2018

District Positions:

  • District Chairman for Leos in convective 4 Leoistic years since 2017/2018
  • DG’s Chief Program Coordinator in 2018/2019, 2019/2020 and 2020/2021
  • Chairman for Vision in 2019/2020 and 2020/2021
  • Chairman for International Photography Contest in 2019/2020 and 2020/2021
  • District Cabinet Officer since 2007

Achievements:

  • Most Outstanding Regional Coordinator 2008/2009
  • Most Outstanding Leo Advisor 2008/2009
  • Best Region Chairperson 2010/2011
  • Most Outstanding Chief Regional Coordinator 2012/2013
  • “TOP TEN” Lions recognition in 2014/2015, 2015/2016 and 2016/2017
  • Multiple District Award Winner for Lions International Environmental Photography Exhibition 2016/17
  • International President’s Certificates of Appreciation from 2008 to 2019
  • “Lion of the Year” at ‘Sahurda Pranama’- 13th Annual District Convention 2017/2018
  • Got 7 winner awards at Annual District Convention 2018/2019 
  • Got 3 winner awards for vision, International photo contest & extension Leo clubs at Annual Multiple District Convention 2018/2019

Family:

  • Spouse Lion Devika is a member of the Lions Club of Dampe since 2007/2008 and was Past President 2017/2018 and a member of the District Ladies Committee since 2007/2008
  • Son, Channa Goonatilleke was a member of the Leo Club of Dampe for 7 years
  • Daughter-in-Law, Shashika, is the 1st Vice President of Lions Club of Dampe for the year 2020/2021, was an active member of the Leo Club of Dampe from 2008 and currently an active member of the Leo Club of Godigamuwa from 2015, a Leo Lion of the Lions Club of Dampe from 2017/2018
  • Daughter, Pavithra, was the Charter President of the Leo Club of Dampe and was an active Leo since 2008/2009 
  • Son-in-Law, Dileepa Jayakody, is an active member of the Leo Club of Werahera

content.name: Leo Tikuli Pitigala
content.intro:
Leo Tikuli Pitigala started her Leo journey as a member of Leo Club of Katuwawala in the year 2013/2014 and she became Club Secretary in 2014/15 and 2016/2017, Vice President in 2015/2016, Club President in 2018/2019 and currently she is serving the club as a Club Director.

District Council

In the year 2015/16 she served as a member of the Editorial panel of Leo District 306A2 and in 2016/17 entered the District Council as the Director of the Editorial Panel. She extended her service to the District as the District Secretary for the Leoistic year 2017/18 and in 2019/2020 she served as the Director for International Relations. Currently she serves as the Chief Administration Coordinator of the Leo District Council 306 A2 and as a Multiple Council Officer of the Leo Multiple 306.

District Activities

Apart from the club and District council responsibilities, she has served the district and has given her contribution on behalf of the district in many capacities. Few of them are,

  • Secretary - Marians Thaala Live in Concert 2020
  • Secretary – Jeewana Yathra 2018
  • Registration Committee Chairperson – Leo Youth Camp – 2018 and Leo District Conference 2018
  • Assistant Secretary - 12th Annual District Conference – 2017
  • Dancing Committee Chairperson - Talentalize District Talent show – 2017

Apart from those, she has also given her contribution in different capacities as a member, Subcommittee Chairperson, Coordinator and as an Advisor representing the Organizing committees of;

  • Annual Leo Youth Camp since 2016/17 to 2019/20
  • Leo District conferences since 2013/14 to 2019/20
  • Leo District talent shows since 2015/16 to 2017/18

Throughout her Leo Career she has actively participated and given her contribution to almost all the district council activities since 2013.

Multiple District Activities

  • Secretary – Trailblazer: Leo Leadership Symposium of Leo Multiple District 306 in 2018
  • Member of the 1st batch of the Leo Graduation Programme which was conducted in 2018 by the Leo Multiple District 306
  • Conference Steering Committee Member – Annual Multiple District Conference 2016/17, 2017/18 and 2018/19.

Awards and Achievements

  • 1st runner up – Most outstanding Club Vice President – 2015/16
  • Winner - Most Outstanding Council Director – 2016/17
  • Winner – Most Outstanding Council Officer – 2017/18
  • Among the Top 10 Leos of the Year – 2017/18
  • Among the Top 5 Club Presidents of the Year – 2018/19
  • Among the Top 10 Leos of the Year – 2019/20
  • Continuously received the District President’s Appreciation award at the Annual District Conferences since 2013/14 to 2019/20.

Leo Tikuli is a proud product of Musaeus College Colombo, and has being an all-rounder excelling in her studies as well as in athletics and dancing during the school time. She has participated for annual sports meets and dancing competitions and has gained many achievements in those. She has served her school as a Senior Prefect in 2011/12 and has given her contribution and participation for the major school events throughout the years. She is a Passed Finalist of CIMA UK and has worked as a Fund Administrator at HSBC Rajagiriya.

content.name: Leo Santhrushika De Silva
content.intro:
Leo Santhrushika De SIlva joined to the Leo movement in 2010 as a club member of Leo Club of Panadura Alubomulla. She was fortunate to become the club Secretary, Club President of the Leo Club of Panadura Alubomulla in the year 2011-2012, 2012-2013 respectively.

She then, was a part of the District council as the Service Director in the year 2014-2015 and was a member of District Editorial Panel in 2015-2016 and had held various other positions in district Council.

Her diligence towards the growth of Leoism has also been recognized in various capacities. She was the,

  • Most disciplined Leo 1st runner up at the Leo District 306A2 conference for the year 2017-2018.
  • The most creative Leo 1st runner up in 2018-2019.
  • Top ten Leos in Leo District Conference 306A2 in 2018 – 2019.

Leo Santhrushika is a proud product of St. John’s Girl’ School, Panadura and Visakha Vidyalaya, Colombo and she holds her bachelor’s degree in Applied Sciences from the University of Sri Jayawardenepura. Furthermore, she is currently reading for her MBA at the Post Graduate Institiue of Management (PIM). In profession she is working as a Junior Executive at Sampath Bank PLC.

content.name: Leo Shehan Akmeemana
content.intro:
• Studied in Mahinda College, Galle.
  • Came to university in 2014 January
  • Inducted as a Leo in 2014 as a member
  • Became the club vice president for the year 2015/16
  • Became the most outstanding club vice president and leo scholar of leo district 306 A2 for the year 2015/16
  • Became the first runner up for most outstanding club vice president of leo multiple district 306 for the year 2015/16
  • Became the club president for the year 2016/17. Club emerged as the most outstanding university leo club in Multiple District 306
  • Worked as the Zonal Director of Zone B1 for the leostic year 2017/18
  • Worked as the director- School Club coordinator for the leostic year 2018/19
  • Worked as the Contest director for the leoistic year 2019/20
  • Became one of the top ten leos for the year of 2018/19 and 2019/20
  • Became the first runners-up of Most Outstanding Council officer in 2019/20
  • Chairman of the District sports day 2018/19
  • Chairman of the Club officer and Advisor workshop and District Conference in 2019/20.
  • Currently serving the district as the Chief Coordinator – Line officers
  • Currently working as an Electrical Engineer in Central Engineering Services (Pvt.) Ltd
  • Mother=Pushpa Danthanarayana
  • Father=Sisira Thilakarathna
  • One sister and one brother

content.name: Leo Isuri Udithamala
content.intro:
Leo Isuri Udithamala started her Leo journey as a charter member of Leo Club of Sri Lanka Technological Campus in the year 2016/2017 and she became a member of board of directors in the same year. Leo Isuri, became the club treasurer in the Leostic year 2017/2018. She has chaired many service projects under varying service criteria that were able to address different issues in the concurrent society.

In the year 2018/2019 she served as a member of the Editorial panel of Leo District 306A2 and she was served to the District as the District Secretary for the Leoistic year 2019/2020. Currently she is serving as the Chief coordinator- Membership growth and Retention of Leo District 306A2 and Multiple council member of Leo Multiple District 306.

Apart from the club and District council responsibilities, she has served the district and has given her contribution on behalf of the district in many capacities since 2016.Her utmost and true dedication towards Leoism and community was admired by Leo District 306A2 at many instances.

She was awarded as the 1st runner up in the Most Outstanding Club treasurer award in the annual Leo District 306A2 conference of Leostic year 2017/2018. Further her outstanding leadership skills were appreciated by awarding her with the Best New Camper in the Leo youth camp 2018 of Leo district 306A2. Leo Isuri was awarded as the Most Outstanding Unit Member in the Annual Leo District 306A2 conference in the Leostic year 2018/2019. She was also awarded as Best Female Camper in the Leo Youth Camp 2020 of Leo District 306A2 and Most outstanding Council member in Annual Leo District 306A2 conference in the Leostic year 2019/2020 the for utmost commitment as a responsible council member.

Leo Isuri is a proud product of Gothami Balika Vidyalaya, and has being an all-rounder excelling in her studies as well as in sports during her school time. She served her alma Mater as the Games Captain of prefect guild in the year 2011/2012. Apart from that she has won colours in cadetting and was an active member of School athletic team from 2005 to 2012.

Leo Isuri is currently reading for Bachelor of Science in Electronics and Engineering Management at Sri Lanka Technological Campus, Padukka where she is an active participant in many campus events. She is an all-rounder with an outstanding persona who is always clad in a beautiful smile.

content.name: Leo Ravindu Vishan
content.intro:
Leo Ravindu Vishan started his Leo journey as a member of Leo club of Piliyandala in year 2014/2015 and in this year he became a member Board of director Le Club of Piliyandala. In year 2015/2016 he became a Club Secretary and he worked as a Treasurer both District youth camp and Jeewana Yathra multi service project.

Then he was club vice president for Leostic year 2016/2017 and he entered to the District Council as District Assistant Secretary. In 2016/2017 he has chaired Jeewana Yathra Multi service project and Leo "Awurudu Uthsawe" in Leo District 306A2. In same year he was one of delegate in ISAAME International Forum. In 2017/2018 he became a District Director and he has chaired district "piritha". Then he has become the Club president of the Leo club of Piliyandala in the year 2018/2019 and under his guidance led them towards a successful Leostic year. In same year he was the district conference treasurer.

In 2020/2021 He is the Region director for the region A and he is a part of multiple district council as a director of service projects.

Leo Ravindu has won many awards and recognition for his contribution to the Leo movements. Few can be seen as,

  • In year 2015/2016 - Most outstanding Club Secretary 1st runners-up Leo District 306A2
  • In year 2016/2017 - Most outstanding Club Vice President 1st runners-up Leo District 306A2
    • o Most outstanding council officer 1st runners-up Leo District 306A2
    • o Top ten Leos of the year – Leo District 306A2
  • In year 2017/2018 - Top ten Leos of the Year - Leo District 306A2
  • In year 2018/2019 - Most Outstanding Club President winner – Multiple District 306 in Sri Lanka.
    • o Under his presidency Leo club of Piliyandala won the most outstanding Omega Leo club of the year multiple district 306 in Sri Lanka.
  • In Year 2019/2020 - Most Outstanding Immediate Past Club President – 1st runners –up Leo District 306A2.

Leo Ravindu is a proud product of Piliyandala Central College and he was completed highest studies in University of Vocational Technology in field of Quantity Survey Diploma and currently him reading for Bachelor of Information Communication Technology Degree in ICBT Campus.

content.name: Leo Stephan Melder
content.intro:
Leo Stephan Melder is a person with true integrity who always made his presence felt, among everyone, He is a truly outstanding, yet Friendly, courageous personality at Leo District 306 A2. His dedication and his intellect are a truly admirable combination. Given a task, he would ensure that it is done to perfection.

He started his forward march in Leoism in 2017 by joining a charter Leo club in the district 306 A2, Leo Club of Saegis Campus as the club treasurer. There after completing the Degree at the University he joined the Parent Leo club of Saegis campus which is Leo Club of Kalubowila in the year 2018/19 as the club president and has served in many capabilities to keep the club in the highest positions in the district and also playing the role of a club Director since 2019.

With his great skills and dedication he has been able to achieve many glory to the Leo Club of Kalubowila and to make it be honored as the Top 05 clubs in the district in the year 2018/19 and also has been able to achieve 01st Runner up for Net Membership Growth, 4th Runner up for the most Administrative Leo club in the District in the year 2018/19 and also to conduct many successful projects which was praised by the district and Multiple and the Project – “Shilpayata Ath Welak, Punchi Muwata Sinahawak” has been able to be a continuing award winning project in the District and the multiple and many more etc. are some to mention in his Presidential year 2018/19. He was first invited to the district council in the year 2019/20 under the District President Leo Mudith Jayasekara to serve as a Zone Director, and currently serving as a Region Director for the Leo district Council in the year 2020/21.

During his Journey in this Leo movement Leo Stephan has been an active member and also conducted major events which were some huge successful stories within the district up to date where his responsibilities were carried out effectively.

  • Conference Secretary - 14th Annual District Conference
  • Chairperson - Ushering Committee - 15th Annual District Conference

Leo Stephan Melder has been recognized many times for the dedication and the commitment shown towards the Leo Movement in many capacities. He has been awarded with the following,

  • Most Outstanding Club Treasurer - 2nd Runner Up - 2017/18
  • Most Outstanding Discipline Leo - 2nd Runner Up - 2018/19
  • Most Discipline Camper - Leo Youth Camp 2019
  • Most Outstanding Club President - 3rd Runner Up - 2018/19

To do all these exceptional services, in his Leostic career his Academic background was an asset to him. He is a Proud Product of Kingswood College Kandy, and S. Thomas’ College Mount-Lavinia. Leo Stephan is a very capable personality who has succeeded in both Academics and Sports and Extra Curricular Activities in his school carrier.

Leo Stephan has graduated with Second Class Honors Division one in Business and Management from University of Salford and is reading for his Master of Business and Management in CCCU UK at Saegis Campus. Currently he is working as an Operation Analyst at Health Recon Connect (Pvt) Ltd. Being the strength of his life is his Father who is a businessman and mother who is a sectional head at Horizon College Malabe and my sister who is studying at Methodist College in the Advanced level class have been great pillars in his life.

content.name: Leo Yasiru Nilan
content.intro:
• Studied at Deniyaya Central College and Rahula College Matara.
  • Started studies at University of Moratuwa on 2014 and joined the Leo Club of University of Moratuwa on the same year.
  • Was a prospect and a members during the Leoistic year 2014/2015.
  • Assistant Secretary of Leo Club of University of Moratuwa during the year 2015/2016.
  • Secretary of Leo Club of University of Moratuwa during year 2016/2017
  • District Director of Editorial Panel during year 2017/2018
  • District Secretary during year 2018/2019
  • Multiple District Assistant Secretary and District Director of Leo Lion Relationships during year 2019/2020. 
  • Region Director In Leoistic Year 2020/2021
  • Chairman of the Information & Technology Committee of Leo Multiple 306 for the year 2020/2021
  • Biggest Achievement in in Leoism,being awarded as the Most Outstanding Leo Club Secretary in Leo Multiple 306 during year 2016/2017
  • Holds the BSc.Engineering (Hons.) in In computer Engineering and currently working as a Software Engineer At OrangeHRM and Co-Founder of PulseQue IT, a Software Startup.
  • Good table tennis player and a cricket player.

content.name: Leo Kavishka Herath
content.intro:
Leo Kavishka Herath joined the Leo movement in 2014 as a member of Leo Club of Dehiwala Papiliyana and then joined to Leo Club of Dehiwala East in the year of 2016 which is where he was privileged to serve as the, club President of Leo club of Dehiwala East for the Leoistic year 2019/20.

During his presidency, with his incredible leadership skills, he become one of the top 10 president of the year 2019/20. After completing that wonderful leostic year he joined with the district work and currently he’s serving as a Zonal Director of Zone A1 for the leostic year 2020/21.

Leo Kavishka completed his both primary and secondary education in St.Johns College Nugegoda. He became the Deputy Head Prefect of his school in the year 2014/15. He completed his Dhamma Education at Sunethradevi Pirivena , Papiliyana.

Currently he is working as a Marketing Executive Officer at LOLC Finance PLC while following his Advance diploma in computer science Scottish Qualification Authority at Saegis Campus. Leo Kavishka Herath is the youngest son of Mr.Herath and Mrs.Apsara Gunathilake and he has one elder brother.

content.name: Leo Savumi Wadduwage
content.intro:
Leo Savumi Wadduwage commenced her Leo journey at the Centennial Leo Club of Saegis Campus, being appointed as the Charter Club Secretary in the Leoistic year 2017/2018. She then transferred to the sister club, the Leo Club of Kalubowila in 2018/2019 as the Club Secretary. She was then trusted with the responsibility of leading her club as the Club President in the year 2019/2020. She was also a member of the District Orientation team in the same year. This year she serves as the Zonal Director for Zone A2 of Leo District 306 A2 as well as a Multiple District Council Officer.

Throughout her Leo journey she has been a member of committees of many District and Multiple District events including positions such as the Secretary of the Leo Youth Camp of Leo District 306 A2 for 2018/19, Assistant Secretary of the Mass Induction Ceremony for 2018/2019, Chairman Opening and Closing Ceremony Committee for Leo Youth Camp 2019/20 and the Secretary of A2 Con’ 20- Annual District Conference of the Leo District 306 A2. She is also a graduate of the second batch of Leos from Leo Graduation program by the Mahendra Amarasuriya Leo Leadership Institute.

Leo Savumi has been recognized for her contribution to the movement with appreciation awards by District and Multiple District Presidents. She was adjudged 3rd runner-up Most Outstanding Club Secretary as well as the Most Outstanding Leo Scholar of Leo District 306 A2 in 2018/2019. In 2019/2020, she was among the top 10 Leo Club presidents, coming up as the 2nd runner up Most Outstanding Club President and 1st runner-up as the Most Supportive Leo.

She is a proud product of Lyceum International School, Panadura where she performed in many sports and extracurricular activities and held positions including Secretary of the Buddhist Society, Senior Prefect, School Basketball team Vice captain and House Vice Captain.

Leo Savumi holds a Bachelor of Arts in Business Management from the University of Greenwich and is currently studying for her Diploma in International Relations from the Bandaranaike Center for International Studies. She currently works at Uber Eats Sri Lanka as the Diviyata Diriya, a program designed for women and marginalized communities in Sri Lanka

content.name: Leo Malki Paranawithana
content.intro:
Leo Malki Paranawithana started her Leo journey as a member of Leo Club of Mattegoda in year2016/2017 and she became a member of Board of Directors in year 2017/2018. She has chaired some remarkable service and fellowship projects in Club and District level, such as Leo Pancha Prayama, Candy Cane 2017 and KIND 2018.

In the year 2017/2018 she entered to the District Council as the Director for Youth Centennial Challenge and same year she served as a member of Editorial Panel of Leo District 306A2. She extended her service as a member of Media Unit of District council in year 2018/2019. Currently she is holding the position as the Zone Director of Zone B1 and a member of Membership retention and orientation committee. Apart from club and district responsibilities, she has given her contribution to the district and represented district in many capacities since 2016. She was a member of committees of Leo Talent Shows, Leo District and Multiple District Conferences, Leo Youth Camps since 2016.

She was a member of first ever Leo ISAAME forum in Sri Lanka and she served as a volunteer in Lions ISAAME forum which was held in Colombo in 2016.Her utmost true dedication towards leoism and community was admired by Leo District 306A2 at many instances. She awarded as the 1st runner-up for the most outstanding Activity Director in Annual Leo District Conference in Leostic year 2017/2018 and awarded as the most outstanding unit member in the same year. She was awarded the winner awards for the projects that she has co-chaired, Candy Cane in 2016/2017 and Leo Pancha Prayama in District and Multiple District Conferences in year 2017/2018. Further her outstanding leadership skills were appreciated by awarding her with the Best Female Camper in Leo Youth Camp – Naula in 2018.

Leo Malki is a proud product of Devi Balika Vidyalaya and has being an all-rounder excelling in her studies as well as in Sports, Athletics and Dancing during her school time. She served her alma mater as the House Games Captain of Upeksha House in year 2012/2013. Apart from that she has won colors in Netball and Handball and an active member of those teams since 2007. Further she was the deputy head prefect of Sri Sumaga Dhamma School, Mattegoda. Currently Leo Malki reading Bachelor of Information Communication Technology Degree in Cyber Security and Networking at University of Kelaniya and she is following an external degree in Criminology and Criminal Justice at University of Sri Jayawardenepura.

content.name: Leo Dilitha Ranjuna
content.intro:
Leo Dilitha Ranjuna started his Leo journey as the charter vice president of Leo Club of Rahula College in the centennial year 2016/17. In that year Leo Club of Rahula College won the title of Most Outstanding School Leo Club. Also in Leo Youth Camp 2017 Leo Dilitha won the title of best new hiker showing his strengths in practical leadership. After leaving the school in 2018 there was a necessity of having an omega Leo Club in Matara area. So with the motive of fulfilling the need of a Community Leo Club for Leos leaving school, Leo Club of Matara Nilwala was chartered under the charter presidency of Leo Dilitha on 2019.

Under the guidance of Leo Dilitha Leo Club of Matara Nilwala has conducted over 45 projects reaching the corners of the island where a need was addressed with their efforts. As the result of his great Leadership Leo Club of Matara Nilwala achieved the title of Most Outstanding New Leo Club in A2Con 2020 and won 28 awards including two winner awards, five runners up awards, five 2nd runners up awards, eight individual awards and four appreciation awards.

Their immense success reached within the 1st year itself was proven with the fact of being awarded as the Most Outstanding New Leo Club in Leo District 306 A2 and 1 st Runner-up in the Leo Multiple District 306, Sri Lanka.Proving his abilities in Leo Movement Leo Dilitha won the title of Most Outstanding Leo Scholar and Most Outstanding Club President 2nd runners up. Leo Dilitha is currently serving the Leo District 306A2 as the Zonal Director of Zone C2

Leo Dilitha is a proud product of Rahula College Matara. While balancing his education he achieved many extracurricular titles in School. He got the golden chance of being a Presidents scout. Also he served as the school scout troop leader in 2016-17 and active member of Rahula College cadet platoon and Cadet Band. Leo Dilitha won the award of best scout in 2017 in Rahula College, proving his true colors.

He got the rare chance to represent Sri Lanka at the 6th Asian scout jamboree which was held in Philippines in 2017. Balancing his academic activities amidst the dedication and devotion towards the Leo movement, currently Leo Dilitha is proceeding with his degree of BSc (hons) in information technology, specialized in software engineering at the Sri Lankan Institute of Information Technology.

content.name: Leo Dithira Wellappuli
content.intro:
Born in the late 90’s as the eldest child of his family, our speaker today, is a proud product of Rahula College, Matara. Surpassing major milestones in education, and at the same time serving his alma mater as a senior prefect, and holding key positions in various clubs and societies in and outside the school, he became the most outstanding student of the year -2018. Once he has had the rare privilege of representing Sri Lanka in an International Student Conference in Tokyo, Japan and he has won silver and bronze medals in the 2017 International Earth Science Olympiad, which was held in France. Currently he is studying as an undergraduate at the Faculty of Medicine, University of Colombo.

If one takes a closer look at the alchemy of a high achiever, two virtues pop up besides perseverance and hard work. That is pioneering spirit and willingness. He commenced his Leoistic career as the charter club secretary of Leo Club of Rahula College in the centennial year 2016-2017, under the guidance of PMDP Leo Lion Kesari Seneviratne PMJF. He became the Most Outstanding School Leo Club Secretary that year. He served as a director of the club in 2017-2018 and then he was invited to serve as the President of Leo Club of Rahula College in 2018-2019. Under his presidency, the club was able to win several awards including the Most Outstanding School Leo Club award at the District Conference that year.

In the year 2019-2020, IPDP Leo Mudith Jayasekara invited him to the District Council for the first time, and he served there as the Director for Quality Education and Literacy.

He is currently a member of Leo Club of Matara Nilwala and he is serving as the Zone Director of Zone C1 under the leadership of DP Leo Praminda Vindika. Ladies and gentlemen, please join me in welcoming Leo Dithira Wellappuli!

content.name: Leo Dulan Wickramarathne
content.intro:
Leo Dulan Wickramarathne joined Leoism in the year 2017 as a club member of the Leo club of Godigamuwa. He had his primary education from Kavanthissa Vidyalaya, Ampara, and secondary education from Royal College, Colombo. He actively participated in school extra-curricular activities such as scouting and was a committee member of many clubs and societies. He’s currently an undergraduate of the University of Sri Jayewardenepura following the degree of BSc In Applied Sciences focused in Polymer Science. He’s also a committee member of the Student Council of Faculty of Applied Sciences.

In His Leo carrier, he was the Club Treasurer of the club for the year 2017/18. He was awarded as the best new Leo of the Leo District 306 A2 and the best new Leo 1st Runner up of Leo Multiple District 306 for the year 2017/18. He became the Vice president of the Leo club of Godigamuwa for the year 2018/19. He took the leadership of the Leo club of Godigamuwa as the club president for the fiscal year 2019/2020. Where he led his team to bring Leo Club of Godigamuwa to the Top 10 Leo Clubs of the District, winning the 1st Runner up award for the club with the best participation to district events and Winning 2nd Runner up award for the most supportive Leo Club of Leo District 306 A2. He was awarded as the 2nd Runner up of the most outstanding club president for the fiscal year 2019/2020. He was able to be a part of the organizing committees of major events in Leo District as the Treasurer of Leo youth camp 2020 and as the Co-Chairman of Souvenir and Printing Committee of A2 Con’20. Currently, he is serving the district as the Zonal Director of Zone C2

content.name: Leo Tharini Subasinghe
content.intro:
Joined Leonism in October 2014 as a member of Leo club of Baddegama and became a director in the club in Leoistic year 2015/16.

She also functioned as the,

  • Club secretary in L/Y 2016/17
  • Club president in L/Y 2017/18
  • Zonal director in L/Y 2018/19
  • District Treasurer in L/Y 2019/20

Currently serving as the Director- District Contest

Awards won,

  • DP Appreciation award in L/Y 2017/18 & 2019/20
  • Most outstanding club president 2nd runner-up L/Y 2017/18
  • Club president excellence award in 2017/18
  • Most outstanding council officer 2nd runner-up L/T 2019/20
  • Among top 10 Leos in L/Y 2019/20

Held positions as,

  • Leo youth camp secretary 2018
  • Ceremonial session secretary A2 Con’18
  • Fund raising Chairman A2Con’19
  • Business Session Secretary A2 Con’20
  • Fund raising Chairman A2Con’20

Education

  • School – Christ Church Girls’ College, Baddegama
  • University – Vavuniya Campus of the University of Jaffna

Extra-curricular Activities at school

  • Head prefect at school in year 2009/10
  • Member of the school English drama society
  • Member of the senior western band, western & eastern choir
  • Member of the school media unit
  • Member of the Girl Guiding Troop

Career 

  • Currently working as an Assistant Accountant at Mast Industries Far East Limited

Family

  • Mother- Mrs. Hasanthi Gunawardana – A teacher
  • Father – Mr. Parakrama Subasinghe – A lecturer

content.name: Leo Dhanushi Wijewardana
content.intro:
Leo Dhanushi Wijewardana started her Leoistic career as a member of the Centennial Leo Club of Sri Lanka Technological Campus in the year 2016/2017. She served the club that year as a member of the Board of Directors. During the next Leoistic year 2017/2018 she became the secretary of the club. She supported many club projects throughout the years and served the district as an Editorial Panel member during the years 2018/2019 and 2019/2020 respectively. Currently, for the Leoistic year 2020/2021, she is serving the Leo District Council 306 A2 as the Director and Chief Editor of the Editorial Panel.

She has been recognized for her outstanding efforts and service to the club as well as the district. She became the Most Disciplined Leo-2nd Runners up and awarded Most Outstanding Leo Club Secretary 1st runners up- in the Leo District Contest 2017/18 conducted by Leo District 306 A2. Leo Dhanushi was the Most Outstanding District Unit Member for the year 2019/2020.

She is a final year undergraduate of Sri Lanka Technological Campus, Padukka, reading Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering degree. She is an active student in many campus events.

She is a proud product of St/Joseph's Convent, Kegalle where she was excellent in her studies as well as in sports. Her family members are always supporting her to reach her goals.

content.name: Leo Crystal Vanburen
content.intro:
Leo Crystal Vanburen was introduced in to the Leo movement in 2019 being the charter president of the Leo club of University of Sri Jayawardenepura. She is the one who initiated the idea of setting up the Leo Club in the university of of Sri Jayawardenepure amidst of many challenges.

Together with her great leadership she was a committee member of project Elation and project HOPE which were jointly organized with multiple district clubs. She took the initiative in organizing the community service project “Punarjeewa” which was carried out in celebration of fifty years of Leoism in Sri Lanka.

Moreover, she was a committee member of “Marians Thaala” concert and A2 CON’20: Leo District Conference.

She, who possesses a euphonious voice, was among the finalists in the Unilever Challenge in 2019 and is currently working at DCI Recruitment (Pvt) Ltd as a marketing & Client Relations executive. She who played the lead role in multitude of projects is currently serving as the Quality Education and Literacy Director of the Leo District 306 A2.

She is a humble personality with a tremendous charisma and an endearing smile. On behalf of Leo Club of Sri Jayawardenepura.

content.name: Leo Pavan Perera
content.intro:
Leo Pavan joined Leoism in year 2017 as a club member of Leo Club of Thurstan College and served as the club treasure in the year 2018/19.

In that year he was able to win the award for Most Outstanding project for Health &Nutrition at the LEO 306 C2 District Conference 2017

After the end of his school career he became the Charter President of Leo Club of Pepiliyana Woodlands with the support of his elder brother Lion Sahan who also was the parental Lions club president in the year.

In his Presidency year Leo Pavan was able to archive many milestones with his team and the dedication and commitment was awarded with,

  • First Runners Up in most Outstanding New Leo in Leo District Conference 2019/2020
  • And subsequently awarded as the second runner up in the Most Outstanding New Leo Club in the District Conference 2019/2020.

Because of his commitment, passion and skills towards Leoism within a very short time this personality entered the District Council in 2020 as the District Director in fundraising.

Leo Pavan is an old boy of Thurstan College Colombo, and has being an all-rounder excelling in his studies as well as in chess during his school time. He served his alma mater as the Chess Captain in 2018/2019 and also he served as a senior prefect in 2019/2020. Apart from that he was an active member of School Media Club from 2017 to 2019.

He is the youngest son of Lion Priyantha Perera MJF & Lion Lady Irani Perera. Brother Lion Sahan Perera who immediate Past President of Pepiliyana Woodlands Lions Club and sister in law Lion Lady Nawodya Liyanage have tremendously supported him all throughout he currently is an undergraduate at University of Plymouth UK following the degree of B.sc Honors in International Management. He is working as a Management Trainee at PS Engineering Services (Pvt) Ltd.

content.name: Leo Thilina Prasad
content.intro:
Joined to Leo Club of University of Moratuwa in 2015 to serve the society and inducted as a Leo member in 2016 and have participated many Leo projects in club level, District level and Multiple level.

  • Director of IT, PR and Publicity of Leo Club of University of Moratuwa – Leoistic year 2017/18(Won Most outstanding IT enabled Club in this year in Leo Multiple District Conference)
  • Director of Editorial of Leo Club of University of Moratuwa – Loistic year 2018/19
  • Worked as advisory member of IT team of Leo club of University of Moratuwa
  • Supported District Level IT related things in all past years
  • IT panel member of A2 Con’18, 19

Life outside the Leo,

  • Father: D. Jayathilaka | Mother: P.H. Premalatha
  • Have 3 Elder sisters and 1 elder brother
  • Primary School: G/ Sirisumana Collage - Rathgama
  • Secondary School: G/Devapathiraja National College – Rathgama
  • Entered to University of Moratuwa in 2015 and studied in Department of Computer Science and Engineering.
  • Graduated from University of Moratuwa in 2020.
  • Currently working as a Software Engineer in Enactor Ltd.

content.name: Leo Osura Perera
content.intro:
Leo Osura Perera joined Leoism in the year 2016 as a club member of Leo club of Godigamuwa. He is a proud product of Royal College Colombo and currently an undergraduate at University of Westminster UK following the degree of B.Eng in Software Engineering and working as a Trainee Software Engineer at LOLC Technologies.

In His Leo carrier he was the President of the Leo club of Godigamuwa for the year 2017/18 and under his guidance led them towards a successful leoistic year under the theme “Strive towards Fraternity”. With his leadership he was able to bring the club to the 5th place in the Leo District 306A2. He then, was a part of the District Council as a Zonal Director, Chairman of A2 IT team in the year 2018/19 and Regional Director in the year 2019/20.

His journey in Leoism he was able to be part of the organizing committees of several events within the Leo District as follows,

  • Chairman – Tickets and participation Committee – District Talent Show 2017/18
  • Chairman – Souvenir and Printing Committee – District Conference 2017/18
  • Chairman – District Christmas Carols 2018/19
  • Chairman – IT and Multimedia Committee – District Conference 2018/19 and 2019/20
  • Chairman – District Pirith 2019/20

He has also been recognized many times for the dedication and the commitment In the year 2017/18,

  • 2nd Runner up - Most Outstanding Club President
  • 2nd Runner up - Most Disciplined Leo In the year 2018/19 year
  • 1st Runner up – Most Outstanding Immediate past Club President
  • 1st Runner up - Most popular Council officer
  • Winner – Most Outstanding line officer
  • Most outstanding top 10 Leos of the year – 2018/19 and 2019/20

And he has also been recognized with district president’s special appreciation award from the year 2017/18 to 2019/20.

So finally currently he serving to the Leo District 306A2 as a Leo Lion Relationship Director.

content.name: Leo Yuran Deshan
content.intro:
Leo Yuran Deshaka joined the Leo Movement in 2011 as a Club President in Leo Club of Kesbewa which reactivated with his presidency. In 2014 he transferred his membership into Leo Club of Piliandala which is where he was become an active member and privileged to serve as the Director and member of the Advisory panel of the Leo Club of Piliyandala.

During his Leo career, he was able to initiate many new projects ideas to his Leo Club as well as to District. He was a one of the five Leos who initiate “Jeewana Yathra” multi-service project in 2012 and he was a Co- Chairman of the “Jeewana Yathra” project in 2014 which was held in Mulattive District. Leo Yuran Deshaka entered the District Council in 2015 as Fundraising Director and he served as a District Council Director of Leo Quality Development in 2019/2020. Currently, he serves as District Council Director of Membership Growth and Retention.

Leo Yuran Deshaka has been recognized and awarded in for his contribution to the Leo Movement including Most Supportive Leo in 2019, Most Outstanding Bulletin Editor in 2019, and Most Outstanding Activity Director- 2 nd Runner-up in 2020 and also he won Most Outstanding Bulletin Editor-1 st Runner-up in Leo Multiple Awards 2019.

He was awarded Leo Service Leadership Gold Award from Lions Club International and LEO Multiple District 306 in 2019 for his services to the Leo Movement.

Leo Yuran Deshaka is a proud product of Central College, Piliyandala and Mahanama College, Colombo 03 and he was engaged with many extracurricular activities. He was a member of School Rugby team and captain of School Lifesaving Association of Central College, Piliyandala. He graduated from Northmbria University, Newcastle in BSc (Hons) in Biomedical Science and is the eldest son of Mr. Mrs. Peramuna and has a one younger brother.

content.name: Leo Navodya Weerapura
content.intro:
She was introduced to leoism in 2019 as the club president of Leo Club of Werahera. Under her guidance the club was reactivated and she was able to lead the club towards a successful leoistic year.

She then got appointed to the council as the district service director in 2020. She was awarded as the Most Disciplined 2nd runners up award in 2019/2020. She was also the Leo of the month in November 2019. This character is from St. Lawrences Covent, Colombo 06. She is doing her higher studies at University of Kelaniya following bachelor in commerce. Currently working as a product development merchandiser (intern) at MAS holdings.

Her mother is also a Past Club President in our parent club and also, she is the advisor of the Leo Club as well. This Leo is also having a brother who is a director of the Leo Club of Werahera.

content.name: Leo Athila Senal
content.intro:
A proud product of St.Peters College Colombo he actively took part in rugger and gymnastics during his academic career. He’s currently studying at Ceylon German Technical Training Institute and also the City and Guilds Institute of London as an automobile engineering student. Successfully working as an entrepreneur in his own workplace Leo Athila is a hardworking and determined individual.

Leo Athila joined leoism in the year 2018 as a club member of Leo club of Kesbewa.and was elected the club president of his mother club for the year 2019/2020 and under his guidance let them towards a successful leoistic year under the theme “Believe in yourself “ . With his leadership he was able to bring the club to the top ten clubs in Leo District 306A2 winning various accolades at the A2’CON20.

He was a part of various events and worked in support of the Leo District 306A2 fellowship team in 2019/2020.

He gave his all as the treasurer of the Mega Multi Service project Jeewana Yaathra 2019 – Ampara.

He gave his all as the treasurer of the Mega Multi Service project Jeewana Yaathra 2019 – Ampara.

His utmost dedication and commitment was recognized as,

  • 2018/2019 - 2nd runner up - Best New Leo of the Year
  • 2019/ 2020 - Top 10 Club Presidents

And was also recognized with district president’s special appreciation award for year 2019/2020.
